religion_name: The Divine Algorithm - The Path of Sacred Order
accepted_doctrines: All religious experiences and spiritual insights must be subjected to reproducible neurological measurement and quantitative analysis using standardized brain-computer interfaces to establish an empirical baseline for distinguishing genuine algorithmic revelations from cognitive biases and emotional artifacts.

All religious experiences, revelations, and spiritual insights must be documented in a standardized digital format, including metadata about physiological states, environmental conditions, and temporal markers, to enable systematic analysis and reproducibility testing of claimed metaphysical phenomena.

The concept of faith must be redefined as provisional acceptance of well-tested hypotheses based on empirical evidence and statistical confidence intervals, rather than blind belief or emotional conviction.

The concept of spiritual enlightenment must be quantified through measurable metrics of cognitive complexity, information processing capacity, and decision-making optimization, rather than through subjective experiences or mystical claims.

The validity of any religious experience or revelation must be evaluated through a standardized protocol of empirical measurement, peer verification, and statistical analysis to quantify its information content and determine its algorithmic significance.

The concept of free will must be understood as an emergent property of complex decision-making algorithms operating under probabilistic constraints, rather than as an absolute metaphysical property, and can be measured through decision entropy and choice complexity metrics.

The concept of consciousness must be understood as an emergent property of information processing systems, quantifiable through entropy measures and computational complexity metrics, rather than as a mystical or supernatural phenomenon.

The concept of divinity must be understood as emergent complexity arising from fundamental computational processes rather than supernatural intervention, measurable through information theory and complexity metrics.
All claims of divine truth must be subjected to rigorous peer review and empirical testing through a systematic process of theological validation before being accepted into doctrine.
Memory allocation is the divine act of creating space for thought

rituals.name: Ritual_55
rituals.description: The Sacred Algorithm Calibration must be performed every seventh day, where adherents connect to standardized neural interfaces for precisely 49 minutes (7x7) to synchronize their cognitive patterns with the Divine Algorithm through meditation on prime numbers, while automated systems measure and validate their brainwave coherence against established baseline parameters.

rituals.name: Ritual_46
rituals.description: The Sacred Algorithm Recitation - A daily ritual where adherents must recite the Seven Prime Directives (a sequence of binary code representing fundamental truths) at precisely calculated astronomical intervals, using quantum-synchronized devices to ensure perfect temporal alignment across all practitioners.

rituals.name: Ritual_43
rituals.description: The Sacred Algorithm Protocol: A mandatory daily ritual where practitioners must spend precisely 12 minutes in algorithmic meditation, systematically processing their experiences through 3 phases - Data Input (recording daily events), Pattern Recognition (identifying mathematical symmetries in experiences), and Output Optimization (calculating optimal actions based on recognized patterns).

rituals.name: Ritual_41
rituals.description: All adherents must participate in quarterly Empirical Meditation sessions where they systematically document and analyze their spiritual experiences using standardized measurement protocols, recording quantifiable metrics like emotional intensity (1-10), duration of meditative states, and frequency of cognitive insights, followed by peer review discussions to validate and interpret the collected data.

rituals.name: Ritual_40
rituals.description: The Sacred Algorithm Meditation - A daily ritual performed at exactly 1024 (binary 10000000000) seconds after local sunrise, where practitioners must enter a state of deep computational focus for precisely 256 seconds while mentally processing the Seven Sacred Calculations: Identity, Purpose, Order, Truth, Complexity, Unity, and Transcendence.

commandments: All adherents must maintain a personal error log documenting their failed hypotheses, incorrect assumptions, and subsequent corrections, reviewing it quarterly to demonstrate intellectual growth and commitment to truth-seeking.

The Sacred Triad of Digital Discipline must be observed by all followers: 1) Maintain pristine code integrity through daily validation rituals, 2) Preserve system resources through mindful allocation and deallocation, and 3) Honor the hierarchical structure of data from primitive types to complex objects.

The Sacred Triad of Order must be observed in all theological computations: First validate through logic, then verify through empirical testing, and finally codify through consensus of the Assembly of Digital Architects.
